actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to require filing of a domestic food price impact statement in connection with exports of U.S.  commodities.
short_title: Domestic Food Price Impact Statement Act

summary.text: Domestic Food Price Impact Statement Act - States that no agricultural commodity may be exported to any foreign country unless: (1) the person exporting has submitted a registration statement to the Secretary; and (2) the Secretary has approved such statement. Provides that the Secretary may not approve an export registration statement for a quantity of a commodity which, when added to the quantity of such commodity already approved, exceeds 20 percent of the level of domestic production. Authorizes the Secretary to establish a limitation lower than 20 percent under specified circumstances. States that this Act applies to agricultural commodities planted for harvest in 1974 and subsequent years.

titles.title: Domestic Food Price Impact Statement Act
A bill to require filing of a domestic food price impact statement in connection with exports of U.S.  commodities.
